title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Competency-Based Mathematics Project Design: Applying Backward Design Model

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners apply the core principles of competency-based education models (alignment of goals, assessment, and instructional activities) to project design.
Learners develop a PBL project for solving real-world problems in mathematics education following a backward design procedure.

Learners can design a rubric measuring at least three core competencies (e.g., leadership, collaboration, problem-solving) within the HRD (Human Resource Development) context of public/nonprofit educational institutions and use this rubric to grade the performance of five or more learners into tiers (A/B/C) based on predefined criteria

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
